successes.title: BioLite BaseCamp Stove | Turn Fire into Electricity
successes.description: We heard you, it's here: advanced off-grid cooking and charging for groups, powered by wood. Can your stove do that?

Pledges.description: Thanks for moving the needle! Get your name up on our website Thank You page at the end of our Campaign
Ask an Engineer - And they'll answer!
Get a shoutout and a personalized answer to a question you have for the BioLite Team through our Ask an Engineer video series, hosted on our site and across our social media.

Weâ€™re commemorating our first ever Kickstarter with a special poster illustrated by the Design Team here at BioLite. This is a unique opportunity to get some rare BioLite artwork connected to the work we do.
BaseCamp Priority Kickstarter Edition - Free Carrying Case!
Get in early on our first production run and be one of the first owners of the BioLite BaseCamp Stove. For the first 500 backers, we'll also include a FREE limited-edition carrying case.
